entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
